title: The Herd Full Show for Feb 10, 2020
itunes:title: The Herd Full Show for Feb 10, 2020
description:
Colin talks about the Tom Brady to the Cowboys rumor and why it isn't as crazy as some people think. Colin explains why he believes LeBron James is the happiest he's been, why certain trades need to take place in the NBA, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Tom Curran, B. J. Armstrong, and Greg Jennings

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
